text: The Last Airbender is a video game for Wii and Nintendo DS. It is based on the movie of the same name. It was released on 29 June 2010 in USA. It was released in Europe on 6 August 2010. It will be released in Australia on September 2010. Like the previous Avatar games, it was developed by THQ Studio Australia and published by THQ. == Characters == *Aang - Air Nomads *Zuko - Fire Nations ==Related pages== * The Last Airbender * Avatar: The Last Airbender * Avatar: The Last Airbender (video game) == References == * The Last Airbender - Wii == Other websites == * Official game page from THQ.com Category:Avatar: The Last Airbender games Category:Nintendo DS games Category:Wii games Category:THQ games Category:Video games based on movies
title: The Last Airbender (video game)
